definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: The combination of aconite and dried ginger perfectly reflected the relativity of seven relations.
sentences.chinese: 附子與乾薑的配伍，較好的反映了配伍七情的相對性。

sentences.english: It had an apple-like flavor, but also like ginger ale.
sentences.chinese: 有蘋果汁般的琥珀色，蘋果風味，也像乾薑水。

sentences.english: Coat inside of glass with Bitters, add ice then recipe, use Ginger Beer where available.
sentences.chinese: 杯裏滴入苦酒和冰塊，儘可能使用乾薑啤酒。

sentences.english: Dry ginger root powder has marked anti-sea-sickness effect which is stronger than dimenhydrinate .
sentences.chinese: 乾薑粉具有明顯的抗暈船作用，其效果強於暈海寧。

sentences.english: No notable side effects were found in the testes after oral dry ginger root powder.
sentences.chinese: 未發現乾薑粉有任何顯著不良副作用。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the sea sickness preventing effect of orally taken dry ginger root powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的驗證服用乾薑粉預防暈船的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiarrhythmic effect of ethyl acetate extract of Radix Ginger(EAERG).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討乾薑醋酸乙酯提取物的抗心律失常作用。

sentences.english: Or would you rather have a soft drink? We have seltzer or ginger ale.
sentences.chinese: 或者你更願意喝軟飲料，蘇打水還是乾薑水？

definition: poor man's ginseng (Codonopsis pilosula)/codonopsis root (used in TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
radish seed (used in TCM to treat indigestion)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
milk vetch/plant genus Astragalus/huangqi 黃芪|黄芪, Astragalus membranaceus (used in TCM)
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
